resources.string:
You did it! See, that wasn't so hard :)


The next step is adding the Link Android SDK to your app.

1) Send the public token shown above to your server to exchange it for an access token and get access to your data 
2) Visit http://plaid.com/docs/link/android for more information on how to integrate 
3) Ready for the big leagues? Unlock production access by visiting http://plaid.com/contact

Uh-oh! It seems something went wrong:
"%1$s"


Visit https://plaid.com/docs/#errors for more information on the error code below 
Error Code: %2$s
You left Link without completing the flow. Reason: %1$s
